In England, in the seven days to 10 May, there were 13,659 new confirmed cases (24.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 May, there were 11,738 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 16% (1,921 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 May is 3,886,016 (6,903.9 cases per 100,000 population).
